source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(ModifiedDate) as lastUpdateDate from saleslt.product

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.Product where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('highwatermark time').output.firstRow.hw_time}' and ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('last modified date from DB').output.firstRow.lastUpdateDate}'
select 'Product' as table_name, '@{activity('last modified date from DB').output.firstRow.lastUpdateDate}' as hw_time

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select CAST (count(*) as Varchar) as custCount
from saleslt.Customer

expression.value: @greater(activity('lookup to read threshold file').output.firstRow.Prop_0, activity('lookup Customer for record count').output.firstRow.custCount)

dependsOn.activity: check if file exists or not

dependsOn.activity: check type of content is file or folder

items.value: @activity('check type of content is file or folder').output.childItems

source.sqlReaderQuery:
declare @sql nvarchar(1000)
set @sql = 'select count(*) as recCount from item()'
exec sp_executesql @sql

scriptLines: preSQLs:['truncate table saleslt.even_cust','SET IDENTITY_INSERT saleslt.even_cust ON'],

activities.name: find total record count of Product Table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select count(*) as productCount
from saleslt.Customer

activities.name: check if product records more than 10

dependsOn.activity: find total record count of Product Table

expression.value: @greater(activity('find total record count of Product Table').output.firstRow.productCount,10)

select count(*) as totalCount 
from saleslt.Customer
